A

addAppointmentButton - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
The button that saves the user-input details as a new appointment record; it also brings the user back to the Appointments Table screen.
AddAppointmentController - Class in controller
This is an FXML Controller class which provides functionality to the Add Appointment screen (the Add Appointment FXML file).
AddAppointmentController() - Constructor for class controller.AddAppointmentController
 
addAppointmentLabel - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This is the header of the Add Appointment page - it reads "ADD APPOINTMENT".
addAppointmentToDatabase(String, String, String, String, LocalDate, LocalDate, String, String, int, int, int) - Static method in class database_CRUD.AppointmentsCRUD
This method adds a new record to the database's Appointments table; the details of this record (as in, the various column values for this record) are input as parameters into this method.
addButton - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The "Add" button on the Appointments Table page, which leads the user to the "Add Appointment" page (where they can create a new appointment, which gets added to the database).
addButton - Variable in class controller.CustomersTableController
The "Add" button on the Customers Table page, which leads the user to the "Add Customer" page (where they can add a new customer, which gets added to the database [and is also visible in the Customers TableView]).
addCustomerButton - Variable in class controller.AddCustomerController
The button that saves the user-input details as a new customer record (in the database's Customers table); it also brings the user back to the Customers Table screen.
AddCustomerController - Class in controller
This is an FXML Controller class which provides functionality to the Add Customer screen (the Add Customer FXML file).
AddCustomerController() - Constructor for class controller.AddCustomerController
 
addCustomerLabel - Variable in class controller.AddCustomerController
This is the header of the Add Customer page - it reads "ADD CUSTOMER".
addCustomerToDatabase(String, String, String, String, int) - Static method in class database_CRUD.CustomersCRUD
This method adds a new record to the database's Customers table; the details of this record (as in, the various column values for this record) are input as parameters into this method.
allAppointmentsRadioButton - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
A radio button that users may select in order to view all appointments that are currently in the database (they will see these appointments in the TableView).
appointmentDescription - Variable in class model.Appointments
The description of the appointment.
appointmentEndDate - Variable in class model.Appointments
The date that the appointment ends on (in the format YYYY-MM-DD).
appointmentEndDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime - Variable in class model.Appointments
The date and time that the appointment ends, in the format DD/MM/YY (with leading zeros used if the day or month value is a single digit) and 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM).
appointmentEndDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime - Variable in class model.Appointments
The date and time that the appointment ends, in the format MM/DD/YY (with any leading zeros in the month and day value removed) and 12-hour time (in the format HH:MM, along with AM or PM).
appointmentEndTime - Variable in class model.Appointments
The time that the appointment ends, in the format HH:MM:SS.ns (this is 24-hour time; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds").
appointmentID - Variable in class model.Appointments
The ID of the appointment.
appointmentLocation - Variable in class model.Appointments
The location where the appointment will take place.
appointmentName - Variable in class model.Appointments
The title of the appointment.
Appointments - Class in model
Each appointment record retrieved from the database (in other words, each record retrieved from the database's Appointments table) will be housed in an object of this class.
Appointments(int, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, int, String, int, String, int, String) - Constructor for class model.Appointments
This is the constructor for the Appointments class; upon the creation of an Appointment object, this method sets the variables (fields) of that Appointment object to be equal to the given parameters.
appointmentsButton - Variable in class controller.MainMenuController
 
AppointmentsCRUD - Class in database_CRUD
This class contains all of the methods used to perform operations on the Appointments database table.
AppointmentsCRUD() - Constructor for class database_CRUD.AppointmentsCRUD
 
appointmentsLabel - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The header on the Appointments Table page, which reads "APPOINTMENTS".
AppointmentsTableController - Class in controller
This is an FXML Controller class which provides functionality to the Appointments Table screen (the Appointments Table FXML file).
AppointmentsTableController() - Constructor for class controller.AppointmentsTableController
 
AppointmentsTableController.MonthConverter - Interface in controller
This functional interface contains an abstract method that will be overridden (in other words, given a body) at a later point (in the "calculateAndDisplayStatisticalReport1()" method).
appointmentsTableView - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The TableView where users will see a list of the appointments that are currently in the database (during the time frame that they selected using the radio buttons).
appointmentStartDate - Variable in class model.Appointments
The date that the appointment starts on (in the format YYYY-MM-DD).
appointmentStartDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime - Variable in class model.Appointments
The date and time that the appointment starts, in the format DD/MM/YY (with leading zeros used if the day or month value is a single digit) and 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM).
appointmentStartDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime - Variable in class model.Appointments
The date and time that the appointment starts, in the format MM/DD/YY (with any leading zeros in the month and day value removed) and 12-hour time (in the format HH:MM, along with AM or PM).
appointmentStartDateInDMY - Variable in class model.Appointments
The date that the appointment starts on, in the format DD/MM/YYYY (with leading zeros used if the day or month value is a single digit).
appointmentStartDateInMDY - Variable in class model.Appointments
The date that the appointment starts on, in the format MM/DD/YYYY (with any leading zeros in the month and day value removed).
appointmentStartTime - Variable in class model.Appointments
The time that the appointment starts, in the format HH:MM:SS.ns (this is 24-hour time; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds").
appointmentTimeRange - Variable in class model.Appointments
The start time and end time of the appointment (in 24-hour time, with the format HH:MM) with a dash between the start time and end time (so as to signify a range).
appointmentType - Variable in class model.Appointments
The appointment's type.
apptContactColumn - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The column of the Appointments TableView that holds the contact involved in each appointment.
apptContactComboBox - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
A combo box (drop-down menu) used to select the contact that will be involved in this new appointment.
apptContactComboBox - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
A combo box (drop-down menu) used to select the contact that is involved in the current appointment.
apptCustomerColumn - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The column of the Appointments TableView that holds the customer involved in each appointment.
apptCustomerComboBox - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
A combo box (drop-down menu) used to select the customer that this new appointment is for.
apptCustomerComboBox - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
A combo box (drop-down menu) used to select the customer that is involved in the current appointment.
apptDescriptionColumn - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The column of the Appointments TableView that holds the description of each appointment.
apptDescriptionTextField - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user inputs the description for the new appointment they wish to create.
apptDescriptionTextField - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user can input a new description (if they wish to modify the description for the appointment currently being modified).
apptEndTimeColumn - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The column of the Appointments TableView that holds the end date and time of each appointment.
apptEndTimeTextField - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user inputs the end time for the new appointment they wish to create.
apptEndTimeTextField - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user can input a new end time (if they wish to modify the end time for the appointment currently being modified).
apptIdColumn - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The column of the Appointments TableView that holds the appointment ID of each appointment.
apptIdTextField - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user would input an appointment ID for the new appointment they are creating; however, because the appointment IDs are currently auto-generated by the database, this text field is disabled and users cannot input anything into it.
apptIdTextField - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This is the text field that displays the ID of the appointment currently being modified; however, the user cannot modify the contents of this text field, as appointment IDs are auto-generated and should not be modified by the user.
apptLocationColumn - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The column of the Appointments TableView that holds the location of each appointment.
apptLocationTextField - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user inputs the location for the new appointment they wish to create.
apptLocationTextField - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user can input a new location (if they wish to modify the location for the appointment currently being modified).
apptsTableDisplayOptionsTG - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The toggle group that groups together the three radio buttons that control the TableView view options ("All Appointments", "This Month", and "This Week").
apptStartDateDatePicker - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This is the Date Picker where the user inputs the start date for the new appointment they wish to create.
apptStartDateDatePicker - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This is the Date Picker where the user can input a new start date (if they wish to modify the start date for the appointment currently being modified).
apptStartTimeColumn - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The column of the Appointments TableView that holds the start date and time of each appointment.
apptStartTimeTextField - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user inputs the start time for the new appointment they wish to create.
apptStartTimeTextField - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user can input a new start time (if they wish to modify the start time for the appointment currently being modified).
apptTitleColumn - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The column of the Appointments TableView that holds the title of each appointment.
apptTitleTextField - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user inputs the title for the new appointment they wish to create.
apptTitleTextField - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user can input a new title (if they wish to modify the title for the appointment currently being modified).
apptTypeColumn - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The column of the Appointments TableView that holds the type of each appointment.
apptTypeTextField - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user inputs the type for the new appointment they wish to create.
apptTypeTextField - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
This is the text field where the user can input a new type (if they wish to modify the type for the appointment currently being modified).
apptUserColumn - Variable in class controller.AppointmentsTableController
The column of the Appointments TableView that holds the user in charge of each appointment.
apptUserComboBox - Variable in class controller.AddAppointmentController
A combo box (drop-down menu) used to select the user that is in charge of this new appointment.
apptUserComboBox - Variable in class controller.ModifyAppointmentController
A combo box (drop-down menu) used to select the user that is in charge of the current appointment.
